learningContent.title: Learning and Training specialization use cases

lcInstruction.p: Here are just a few use cases for the DITA L&T specialization:

ul.li: Developing content for instructor-led training. You can use the L&T specialization to create the slides for the presentation as well the printed materials handed out to students, including: course outlines, workbooks, review materials, and pre- and post-assessments.
Developing content for e-learning. The L&T specialization allows you to prepare and organize learning content and assessments for the web (just like Scriptorium does for LearningDITA).

If the training and other content creating teams use DITA, all teams can develop and share content among groups. While actual presentation and discussion of materials might take different forms, both groups can share common blocks of text, images, tables of data, and so on.
